headline.main: REICH NAVY HANDBOOK RECORDS NO LOSSES; 1940 Edition of Weyer Incomplete in Other Details on Fleet

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Jan. 2 (UP)--The 1940 edition of Germany's naval handbook, Weyer, appearing today, mentinned neither Germany's losses since the beginning of the war nor new building since the last edition. The handbook, however, recorded alleged osses inflicted on Britain up to the date the book went to press.
